Title: Relates to conducting appeals, within the department of family assistance, by means of electronic communications systems conference with independent hearing officers
Summary: Permits appeals to the department of family assistance to be conducted by means of a conference telephone, video conference or similar communications systems with and by independent hearing officers.
LawCode: Amd ยง22, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to permitting appeals to the department of family assistance to be conducted by means of a conference telephone, video conference or similar communications systems with and by independent hearing officers
